member.name: NMCBEENDEDITA
member.summary: Contains information about the conclusion of an edit operation within a ComboBoxEx control. This structure is used with the CBEN_ENDEDIT notification code.

member.name: NMCBEENDEDITA.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains information about the notification code.

member.name: NMCBEENDEDITA.fChanged
member.summary: A value indicating whether the contents of the control's edit box have changed. This value is nonzero if the contents have been modified, or zero otherwise.

member.name: NMCBEENDEDITA.iNewSelection
member.summary: The zero-based index of the item that will be selected after completing the edit operation. This value can be CB_ERR if no item will be selected.

member.name: NMCBEENDEDITA.szText
member.summary: A zero-terminated string that contains the text from within the control's edit box.

summary.para: A value that specifies the action that generated the CBEN_ENDEDIT notification code. This value can be one of the following:

listheader.description: The user activated the drop-down list.
The edit box lost the keyboard focus.
The user completed the edit operation by pressing ENTER.
